entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 12:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain

Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
